name: qrcp
title: QRCP
description: Transfer files over Wi-Fi from/to your computer to/from your mobile device by scanning a QR code without leaving Raycast.
author: yohann84l

commands.name: receive
commands.title: Receive Files
commands.description: Display a QR code to be scanned to start the file transfer.

commands.name: send
commands.title: Send Files
commands.description: Share the currently selected files in Finder by displaying a QR code to be scanned.

preferences.name: downloadDirectory
preferences.title: Download Directory
preferences.description: Location where received files are saved.

preferences.name: openFinderOnReceive
preferences.label: Open Finder After Receive
preferences.description: Automatically open the download folder after receiving a file.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
